description: SS1 Ver.16.0.0.10 and earlier (Media version:16.0.0a and earlier) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files and execute OS commands with SYSTEM privileges.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Ver.2.1.3 and earlier (Affected under Windows environment only)
Ver.16.0.0.10 and earlier (Media version:16.0.0a and earlier) (Affected under Windows environment only)
